title: Digital Module-Based Project Learning to Address Learning Gaps in Filipino 11

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Filipino grammar and communicative competence
context.additional_context: Course focusing on enhancing Filipino 11 core concepts and digital media analysis skills to improve language proficiency for science sector managers/leaders.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the historical background of the Filipino language and explain its developmental process.
Learners can perform effective communication by utilizing cohesion devices across diverse text types.
Learners can analyze language usage patterns in digital media contexts and conduct critical evaluations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
